section.p: You are caught in a narrow defile, and seized by many men. You are hauled before Captain Vorkung, who sentences you to be hanged. Sentence is carried out immediately. Your adventures are over, unless you have a resurrection deal.

If you do have a resurrection deal, turn to the paragraph you have noted. Also, through a quirk of magical fate, somehow the royal ring has travelled with you through the lands of the dead. Retain it on your Adventure Sheet.
